title: Central Air Conditioning, Oversized Closets, Linen Closet
posting_body: ['Cambridge Square Apartments in Southfield, Michigan, offers spacious one and two-bedroom floor plans within a lush, park-like setting.', 'Features include covered parking, laundry facilities, and central air conditioning.', 'Cambridge Square provides easy access to local expressways including I-696 and is just minutes from Birmingham, Royal Oak, Berkley and Ferndale and only two miles from both Beaumont and Providence Hospitals.', 'Call us today for your personal tour!', '-Oversized Closets', '-Covered Parking', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Dining Room', '-Oops Late Fee Forgiveness', '-Secured Entry with Intercom', '-Application Fees Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Cash Payments Accepted At Select Retailers', '-Playground', '-Hardwood', 'Flooring in Some Areas', '-Laundry Facility', '-Additional Storage', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
